name: No Water in Hell
description:
Fight through the legions of the damned and dead in No Water in Hell, a 2D Roguelike Dungeon Crawler where players traverse the 9 circles of Hell and take down the monsters of the Underworld with the help of their trusty fire hose, as they try to survive the horrors that await.

Collect a range of armor and weapon upgrades in a procedurally generated dungeon layout which ensures no two playthroughs are ever the same -- all within a wide range of biomes with varying enemies and bosses. Loot your enemies to regain health and earn money to spend at shops throughout the Underworld.


No Water in Hell is a randomly generated 2D Roguelike Dungeon Crawler shooter with heavy Roguelike elements. Take on the challenge of slaying legions of the damned using nothing more than a fire hose as you find bizarre treasures that improve or alter your capabilities, giving you the chance to excellent in a given playstyle of your choice. Knock enemies into walls or holes, kite enemies around rooms, and discover and defeat the bosses of the 9 circles of Hell as you dive deeper into Hell. Try to survive and you just might escape in the end.


No Water in Hell is a roguelike dungeon crawler inspire by some of the other great games in the genre like Binding of Isaac or Crypt of the Necrodancer, with a silly take on serious gameplay themes from games like DOOM. It is thematically inspired by Dante's Divine Comedy which depicts the 9 circles of Hell. No Water in Hell is stylized in 1990s pixel art sprites with an extensive chiptune soundtrack, and features an extensive set of polished visual effects to boot.
